original_text: When these people attack you, I will make you like a strong wall. You will be like a wall that is made of bronze. The people will not be able to knock you down. I will be with you to protect you. I will keep you safe.’ That is what the Lord says. When these people attack you, I will make you like a strong wall. You will be like a wall that is made of bronze. The people will not be able to knock you down. I will be with you to protect you. I will keep you safe.’ That is what the Lord says. When these people attack you,
korean_text: 내가 너로 이 백성 앞에 견고한 놋 성벽이 되게 하리니 그들이 너를 칠지라도 이기지 못할 것은 내가 너와 함께 하여 너를 구하여 건짐이라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: I will make you like a strong wall.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 강한 벽과 같게 만들겠다.

sentences.original_text: You will be like a wall
The people will not be able to knock you down.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 너를 무너뜨릴 수 없을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: I will be with you to protect you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너와 함께 있어 너를 보호할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says.
